args.text:
# This script explores the potential applications of octopus-inspired technology in the field of marine biology.

# Define the scope and objectives of the script.
# The objective of this script is to research and identify potential applications of octopus-inspired technology in the field of marine biology.

# Research potential applications of octopus-inspired technology in the field of marine biology.
# Octopus-inspired technology has the potential to revolutionize the field of marine biology. Some potential applications include:
# - Developing new underwater propulsion systems based on the way octopuses move.
# - Creating new types of underwater sensors and cameras that mimic the way octopuses see and sense their environment.
# - Designing new types of underwater robots that can manipulate objects and move through tight spaces like octopuses can.

# Define variables.
octopus_applications = ["Developing new underwater propulsion systems based on the way octopuses move", 
                       "Creating new types of underwater sensors and cameras that mimic the way octopuses see and sense their environment", 
                       "Designing new types of underwater robots that can manipulate objects and move through tight spaces like octopuses can"]

# Print potential applications.
for application in octopus_applications:
    print(application)
